Summary: saw a large white object almost at gound level ,rise up,move to the right.
divs: Sighting Detailslooked out my window, I noticed a very large white light, size of my hand or larger. It was low close to gound, moved up, and to my right. Very bright light. I went to my front but could not see it.I knew that it was going to be in the area. I did not sleep to well the rest of the night. I was up at 4:00 not able to go back to sleep.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 29th 2010
